Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture showing two people communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can include in the drawing how sound travels through the string to help people communicate.
The student can represent in the drawing that the device uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can depict the specific features of the string telephone, such as cups and a taut string between them.
The student can show in the drawing that only the provided materials (such as cups and string) are used in building the telephone.
The student can illustrate how this communication device solves the problem of talking over distances in their drawing.
